lead_paragraph: PGA Tour commissioner Tim Finchem doesn't believe that five players skipping the Olympics will hurt golf's chances for staying on the program beyond 2020.

headline.print_headline: Finchem Not Concerned Over 5 Players Skipping Olympics
headline.main: Finchem Not Concerned Over 5 Players Skipping Olympics

snippet: PGA Tour commissioner Tim Finchem doesn't believe that five players skipping the Olympics will hurt golf's chances for staying on the program beyond 2020....
